name: Lotus Armageddon
description:
In this game, you help a little girl who is lonely.

Also, there is violence and guns and heavy metal.

This is my last entry in the "Bullet-Hell Hotline Miami" genre. If you enjoy it, you will probably also like my games Gun Orphan and Dubstep Ghost.

Controls:

Movement - WASD / Arrow Keys 

Aim - Mouse

Shoot - Left Click 

Activate Thrusters - Shift / Space

Bullet Capture Ability - Right Click / Alt 

Reset the current level - R

Technical

I support recent versions (less then two years old) of:

  • Firefox
  • Chrome
  • The New (Chromium-Based) Edge
  • Brave
  • Opera

If you are playing on Opera, turn off mouse gestures, otherwise the control scheme will result in you opening and closing random tabs.

On Firefox, shift-right click is a hotkey, so be sure to use space instead of shift to activate your thrusters.

Pretty much all browsers use Alt for hotkeys, play full-screen to suppress this behavior.

The snake game from the loading screen is based on this guy's code. I know how to program snake, I'm just lazy.
